name: scraping
content:
scraping noun
(RUBBING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] the act of removing the surface from something using a sharp edge or something rough : Use techniques that generate less dust, such as wet sanding or scraping. I do all the chopping, scraping and pressing the garlic.
[ U ] the act of rubbing against a surface so that slight damage or an unpleasant noise is produced: I heard the scraping of a chair and then footsteps. There was a scraping noise as the train derailed.
[ C usually plural ] a small part that has been removed from the surface of something with a sharp edge or something rough : The pathologist collected fingernail scrapings from Craig's hands. The roads are so narrow that trucks leave scrapings of paint on the mountain walls.
